title: Saipan Beachfront Paradise with Five Restaurants & Bars
description: Disconnect from the everyday at Crowne Plaza Hotels & Resorts Saipan, an IHG Hotel, a beachfront oasis overlooking the palm-fringed paradise of Micro Beach. Flop and drop and savour moments sipping cocktails at Mari Bar, cooling off at the hotel's two outdoor swimming pools or working out at the fitness centre. When it comes to wining and dining, you're spoilt for choice with five restaurants and bars, from a market-style bakery to a fiery teppanyaki house and a cultural dining experience.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Hotels & Resorts Saipan, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Coral Tree Ave, Garapan, Saipan 96950, Northern Mariana Islands
